titleStmt.title: Humble advice: or The heads of those things which were offered to many Honourable Members of Parliament by Mr Richard Baxter at the end of his sermon, Decemb. 24. at the Abby in Westminster. With some additions as they were delivered by him to a friend that desired them, who thought meet to make them publick.
titleStmt.author: Baxter, Richard, 1615-1691.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Thomas Underhill and Francis Tyton,

notesStmt.note: Annotations on Thomason copy: "Jan. 2nd"; the second '5' in the imprint has been crossed out and replaced with a "4".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
